alert.note: Alert for Guernsey; Muskingum; Noble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 6:16PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN GUERNSEY...EASTERN MUSKINGUM AND NORTHWESTERN NOBLE COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM EDT... At 615 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near McConnelsville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Zanesville, Cambridge, New Concord, Byesville, Philo, Pleasant Grove, Senecaville, Pleasant City, Cumberland, Lore City, Belle Valley, and Norwich. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Ohio between mile markers 156 and 186. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 28 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for east central Ohio.
